document_data.name: Spell Reflection
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spell reflection''''' was an obscure [[incantation]] [[spell]] that caused incoming spells to bounce back on their casters. It was known mostly only by [[flameskull]]s.<ref group="note">This ability of flameskulls was removed in later editions, so counterparts for this spell are unknown.
document_data.Effects: ''Spell reflection'' caused all spells reaching the target to be returned to their caster. If the spell did damage, the caster would suffer it; otherwise, the spell was negated.
document_data.Components: It required only a [[verbal component]], making it useful for flameskulls.
document_data.History: ''Spell reflection'' was lost or long forgotten to most mages, and only remembered by old [[flameskull]]s in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Notable Users: * The [[Lichlord]], a [[lich]] who sought to avert [[Karsus's Folly]] by conquering [[Netheril]], had his clothing enchanted with ''spell reflection''.
